TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMobileWebFormServices

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: Define uma interface para um componente do designer de página obter serviços de um host de designer, como Visual Studio 2005 em tempo de design.

span.span: Defines an interface for a page designer component to obtain services from a designer host such as Visual Studio 2005 at design time.

summary.span: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Todos os métodos nessa interface devem ser implementadas pelo host de design e disponibilizado para os componentes do designer nesta interface.All methods in this interface are to be implemented by the design host and made available to designer components through this interface. Antes de tentar usar os métodos em um componente de designer personalizado, verifique se que o host de design, na verdade, implementa a interface.Before attempting to use the methods in a custom designer component, verify that the design host actually implements the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ClearUndoStack ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearUndoStack() cil managed
Public Sub ClearUndoStack ()
public: void ClearUndoStack();

summary.span: Limpa todos os itens no cache **Desfazer** do host de designer em tempo de design.

span.span: Clears all items in the designer host's **Undo** cache at design time.
This API is obsolete.

summary.span: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Desde o método é implementado pelo host do designer, verifique se ele existe antes de invocá-lo.Since the method is implemented by the designer host, verify that it exists before invoking it.

param.name: rootControl

summary.span: Atualiza recursivamente o controle associado e cada um de seus controles filho no host de design em tempo de design.

span.span: Recursively updates the associated control and each of its child controls in the design host at design time.
This API is obsolete.
